content.en: Low-light image enhancement: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the quality of images taken in low-light environments. These algorithms, such as the progressive two-stage image enhancement network and the deep retinex model, use deep learning and Retinex theory to enhance low-light images. They aim to reduce noise, color distortion, and artifacts while balancing local details and global information. These advancements in image enhancement technology offer promising solutions for obtaining clear and visually appealing images even in challenging lighting conditions.
content.da: Billedforbedring ved lavt lys: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af billeder taget i miljøer med lav belysning. Disse algoritmer, såsom det progressive to-trins billedforbedringsnetværk og den dybe retinex-model, bruger dyb læring og Retinex-teori til at forbedre billeder med lav belysning. De sigter mod at reducere støj, farveforvrængning og artefakter, samtidig med at de balancerer lokale detaljer og global information. Disse fremskridt inden for billedforbedringsteknologi tilbyder lovende løsninger til at opnå klare og visuelt tiltalende billeder, selv under udfordrende lysforhold.
